&FlowMultiTagRowRequest; declare @p char(6), @r nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000) select top 0 tr.id, he_so, gia_nt, gia, c.ma_nt, rtrim(b.tk_vt) as tk_vt, rtrim(b.tk_gv) as tk_gv, rtrim(b.tk_tl) as tk_tl, b.nhieu_dvt, rtrim(a.ma_lo) as ma_lo, b.lo_yn, rtrim(a.ma_vi_tri) as ma_vi_tri, 0 as vi_tri_yn,rtrim(stt_rec_dh) as stt_rec_dh,rtrim(stt_rec0dh) as stt_rec0dh &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; into #d from #tagRow tr cross join d66$000000 a cross join dmvt b cross join m66$000000 c
set @r = ' insert into #d select tr.id, he_so, gia_nt, gia, c.ma_nt, rtrim(b.tk_vt) as tk_vt, rtrim(b.tk_gv) as tk_gv, rtrim(b.tk_tl), b.nhieu_dvt, rtrim(a.ma_lo) as ma_lo, b.lo_yn, rtrim(a.ma_vi_tri) as ma_vi_tri, case when exists(select top 1 ma_kho from dmvitri where dmvitri.ma_kho = a.ma_kho) then 1 else 0 end as vi_tri_yn, rtrim(stt_rec_dh) as stt_rec_dh,rtrim(stt_rec0dh) as stt_rec0dh &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; from (select id, stt_rec, stt_rec0 from #tagRow where p = ''%Partition'') tr join d66$%Partition a on tr.stt_rec = a.stt_rec and tr.stt_rec0 = a.stt_rec0 left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt join m66$%Partition c on tr.stt_rec = c.stt_rec '
select distinct p into #p from #tagRow select @p = min(p) from #p while @p is not null begin set @q = replace(@r, '%Partition', @p) exec sp_executesql @q select @p = min(p) from #p where p > @p end
select '' as array$, id, &OtherCopyField; from #d &FlowMultiOrderBy; return
